metoffice.title: Yellow warning of rain affecting South West England
metoffice.summary: Yellow warning of rain affecting South West England: Bath and North East Somerset, Bournemouth Christchurch and Poole, Bristol, Cornwall, Devon, Dorset, Gloucestershire, North Somerset, Plymouth, Somerset, South Gloucestershire, Swindon, Torbay, Wiltshire valid from 2300 Tue 02 Sep to 1300 Wed 03 Sep

heat.text: Little impact observed on health, healthcare services and social care provision. Business as usual.

cold.text: Little impact observed on health, healthcare services and social care provision. Business as usual.
